snippet.title: BLADESONG | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON STEAM ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/2305640/Bladesong/
JOIN OUR DISCORD TO CLAIM A KEY ► https://discord.gg/bladesong

Have you ever dreamt of designing your very own swords? BLADESONG is a swordmaking game with truly unlimited creative possibilities.

Crafting/management game Bladesong is set on taking swordmaking mechanics to a new level, featuring unparalleled customization of the sword's every detail and deep analysis of the sword's physical properties. Take the role of a swordsmith in the city of Eren Keep, one of mankind’s last standing cities after the gods have banished themselves in an act of desperation. Run your forge, fulfill customer commissions and perfect your craft and tools. Find your way in a city governed by an idolized ruler with an iron grip and build a loyal team of those you deem trustworthy.

Bladesong is the debut title from SUN AND SERPENT creations, a new indie studio based in Germany. The game is in early development and a release date is yet to be announced.

Voice: Deanna Johnston
Music/Sound: Jake Gaule (Submerged Tapes)

www.bladesonggame.com
